Package org.gradle.plugins.ear

package org.gradle.plugins.ear
Support for generating EAR archives in a Gradle build
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.gradle.plugins.ear.descriptor
    Classes for working with EAR deployment descriptors.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Ear
    Assembles an EAR archive.
    EarPlugin
    A Plugin with tasks which assemble a web application into a EAR file.
    EarPluginConvention
    Deprecated.
    Instead of using conventions, configure the tasks directly.
